title: Connection Issue Ingame
body: Recently I keep lagging in game but I don't know if it's on my part. Nothing was changed on my part that would of made this happen but I keep disconnecting randomly from my game constantly and its happening frequently where I can't play a game. My fps won't change or anything, same for my ping but, I know I disconnect because no damage will be registering and I'm kinda just floating around the map. Also when I do reconnect no champs shows on the mini map or my screen and ill just disconnect right back again. Actually happening while I type this and I've tried leaving and reconnecting, no luck as I can't even play the game. Probably dc'd around 10 times now with no luck reconnecting where I can actually play.

replies.body:
Sometimes your network can just have a hard time getting connected to specific servers. We may just need to adjust some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you can get through to our servers.

The fact that you said your champion just kinda floats around sometimes kind of makes me think you might be having some packet loss as well. Go ahead and use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) as well, just to make sure we cover all of our bases. Take a screenshot of what it says, and post it here so we can look over it together!
Same here my discord and Skype works perfectly fine, but my league d/cing.
